body:
Ok, I got a repro.

Here is the failing case:
```python
print(torch.DoubleTensor([1e-323]))
```
Fails with the error you mentioned. This seems to be an edge case though, as both `1e-322` and `1e-324` works.

The issue is in [this line](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/_tensor_str.py#L122), where `scale` becomes zero because `exp_max` is a too large negative number. Maybe we should clip `scale` to be positive?
